text: iṉṉum, allāh uṅkaḷukkāka uṅkaḷiliruntē maṉaiviyarai ēṟpaṭuttiyirukkiṟāṉ; uṅkaḷukku uṅkaḷ maṉaiviyariliruntu cantatikaḷaiyum; pēraṉ pēttikaḷaiyum ēṟpaṭutti, uṅkaḷukku nalla poruṭkaḷiliruntu ākāramum aḷikkiṟāṉ; appaṭiyiruntum, (tāmē kaṟpaṉai ceytu koṇṭa) poyyāṉatiṉ mītu īmāṉ koṇṭu allāhviṉ aruṭkoṭaiyai ivarkaḷ nirākarikkiṟārkaḷā
